Text:
Actually it is Season 5,I have checked and verified. it's just that the files and folder were mislabelled. 
See following for episode guide : 

http://epguides.com/ManvsWild/

Both season 5 and 7 are correct, depends on how you see it, since before it was season 5 and now they have remade the old seasons and put seasons together, so it was season 7 before!

Anyone know if any new episodes are coming?

Ehm I don't want to be that guy since all is "free" but give at least credit to the one who originally uploaded it, and  looking on the dates it was this guy:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5862714/Man_Vs._Wild_-_Season_7

Just changed this to Season 5, which it became after they remade a lot of episodes.
What the fuck! This is season 7! It seems all Bear Grylls episodes are fucked up. How hard is it to label some episodes correctly?
You've got one episode in there twice - labelled as two different episodes in one, and none in another. *sigh*
This is season 5, the correct listing is on wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Man_vs._Wild_episodes
